ComicInfo.Title: Something Old, Something New...; Carlin and Simonson's Page O' Thor Stuff
ComicInfo.Summary: Odin has the dwarves create a hammer for Bill and sends the alien and his son into space to rescue Bill's people.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 14:37:03. [Issue ID 38232]
